headline: Is Global Payments at a Turning Point After 36.5% Share Price Drop?
summary: Curious whether Global Payments is a diamond in the rough or just another falling knife? You are not alone. Unraveling its current valuation might surprise you. After a tough year, Global Payments' share price has fallen by 36.5% over the past 12 months and is down over 15% in the last month alone. This signals shifting sentiment and risk around the stock. Recent headlines have focused on industry-wide concerns about changes in consumer spending habits and evolving fintech competition, which...
